channel.title: 317 delta help plz

item.title: 317 delta help plz
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Like it says, a non static variable cannot be referenced from a static context.

so change the variable declaration to something like:

public static int cwarssaramax = 0;
public static int cwarszammymax = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: 317 delta help plz
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Codes that have the problems are:

[code]if(inZamorak() || inSaradomin()) {
sendFrame126(“Game Starts in”, 6570);
sendFrame126("@gre@" + PlayerHandler.waitTime, 6572);
sendFrame126("@yel@Your Team: #b%gb2$%", 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
}
if(PlayerHandler.waitTime == -1 && inZamorak()) {
toX = 2372;
toY = 3131;
}
if(PlayerHandler.waitTime == -1 && inSaradomin()) {
toX = 2427;
toY = 3076;
}

if(PlayerHandler.gameTime == -1 && absX >= 2079 && absX <= 2110 && absY >= 4417 && absY <= 4442)
{
toX = 3308;
toY = 2799;
}

if(server.sarascore > server.zammyscore && issara == true)
{
addItem(1, 1);
issara = false;
}
if(server.sarascore < server.zammyscore && iszammy == true)
{
addItem(1, 1);
iszammy = false;
}[/code]

if(gameTime == 0) { cwarssaramax = 0; cwarszammymax = 0; waitTime = 180; }

Read full topic
